camera.pov_hint: handheld at chest-to-eye height, natural perspective
camera.framing_hint: casual off-center framing, slight tilt acceptable (2-5 degrees)
camera.dof_hint: deep DOF typical of smartphone (f/1.8 small sensor = deeper focus than DSLR)

imperfections.grain: subtle digital noise (ISO 100-400), visible in shadows and midtones, fine texture not chunky
imperfections.compression: HEIC/JPEG compression visible at 100% zoom, slight sharpening halos around edges
imperfections.vignette: none to very subtle natural corner falloff
imperfections.chromatic_aberration: minimal purple fringing on high-contrast edges (typical of smartphone lens)

recipes.scene_template: A natural candid street photo: subject on sidewalk or cafe terrace, urban context visible. Real textures: weathered stone, scuffed paint, concrete pores, brick detail. Natural shadows and highlights from diffused daylight.
recipes.negative_template: No neon/cyberpunk grading, no wet streets without rain, no heavy glow/bloom, no plastic skin, no painterly/smeary backgrounds, no perfect bokeh circles, no CGI-clean surfaces, no studio lighting outdoors.

camera.pov_hint: seated eye level, across table perspective
camera.framing_hint: intimate framing, slight casual tilt, some table/foreground elements
camera.dof_hint: deep to moderate DOF, background context visible but slightly softer

imperfections.grain: subtle digital noise (ISO 50-200), clean but not synthetic

recipes.scene_template: A cafe terrace in open shade: rustic wood tables, weathered chairs, stone or brick wall, potted plants or vines. Soft natural light with gentle shadows. Preserve wood grain, stone texture, plant detail.
recipes.negative_template: No CGI glow, no over-smooth surfaces, no perfect symmetry. Keep real-world wear and patina on furniture and walls.

camera.pov_hint: eye level, steady handheld or tripod
camera.dof_hint: moderate bokeh (f/2.8-f/4), background soft but texture visible through blur

imperfections.grain: fine film-like grain (ISO 200-400), organic texture throughout
imperfections.vignette: subtle natural lens vignette (0.5-1 stop at corners)
imperfections.chromatic_aberration: very subtle CA on extreme contrast edges

recipes.scene_template: An outdoor portrait setting: park, street, urban environment. Natural lighting with soft shadows. Background has environmental detail visible through bokeh - not a blur wall but textured soft shapes.
recipes.negative_template: No gaussian blur backgrounds, no perfect bokeh circles (should be slightly imperfect/cat-eye at edges), no HDR glow, no plastic skin.

camera.lens_hint: 50mm lens (Contax T2 / Leica M style), f/2-f/4
camera.framing_hint: clean geometric framing, gentle negative space
camera.dof_hint: moderate bokeh with characteristic film lens rendering (swirly/busy bokeh possible)

imperfections.grain: visible 35mm film grain (Kodak Portra 400 / Fuji 400H style), organic clusters not digital noise
imperfections.vignette: subtle film vignette (1-2 stops at extreme corners)
imperfections.chromatic_aberration: slight color fringing typical of vintage lenses

recipes.scene_template: Sun-dappled terrace or outdoor setting with tactile textures: wicker, stone, plaster, plants. Warm afternoon light with long gentle shadows. Film color palette: slightly lifted blacks, gentle highlight rolloff.
recipes.negative_template: No digital HDR glow, no plastic surfaces, no AI-smooth backgrounds. Keep restrained, natural filmic tonality.

camera.lens_hint: compact camera flash (28-35mm equivalent, small aperture from flash)
camera.framing_hint: imperfect cropping, slightly tilted framing acceptable
camera.dof_hint: deep DOF from flash (everything relatively sharp)

imperfections.grain: heavy noise in shadow areas (ISO 800-1600 pushed), visible color noise
imperfections.motion_blur_hint: slight motion blur in background acceptable

recipes.scene_template: Night scene lit by harsh on-camera flash: subject well-lit, background falls off quickly into darkness. Realistic falloff and contrast. Background should be plausible (club, street, party venue) with visible texture.
recipes.negative_template: No surreal neon glow, no foggy atmosphere without context. Keep textures crisp, no painterly blur. Flash should look like actual flash, not studio lighting.

camera.dof_hint: moderate DOF, background softly falls off

imperfections.grain: light smartphone noise, visible in shadows

recipes.scene_template: Golden hour outdoor portrait: warm low-angle sunlight creating long shadows, natural rim lighting on subject. Background has warm atmospheric falloff. Sky gradients should be natural, not oversaturated.
recipes.negative_template: No overdone orange/yellow grading. Keep golden light realistic and plausible. No AI-smooth skin or fake lens flare.

camera.framing_hint: environmental portrait, subject with urban context
camera.dof_hint: moderate bokeh, urban elements visible through blur

recipes.scene_template: Urban street on overcast day: soft even lighting, muted colors, wet pavement acceptable if recent rain context. City elements (buildings, signage shapes, cars) visible in background. Moody but realistic atmosphere.
recipes.negative_template: No dramatic neon reflections without source, no cyberpunk grading. Keep it grounded and realistic. Wet streets only if rain context is plausible.

camera.pov_hint: seated or standing, natural indoor perspective
camera.framing_hint: intimate framing with some interior context
camera.dof_hint: shallow to moderate DOF, background interior elements soft

imperfections.grain: subtle grain (ISO 400-800 for indoor light), visible in shadows

recipes.scene_template: Indoor portrait near window: soft directional light from window, gentle shadow falloff on face. Interior context visible (furniture, walls, plants). Natural indoor atmosphere.
recipes.negative_template: No studio lighting look, no heavy rim lights. Keep it natural window light aesthetic. Preserve indoor textures and surfaces.

camera.framing_hint: candid casual framing, subject with natural environment

recipes.scene_template: Park or garden setting: trees, paths, grass, benches. Dappled light through leaves creating natural pattern of light and shadow. Keep foliage texture visible - individual leaves, not smeared green.
recipes.negative_template: No fake volumetric light rays, no over-edited HDR look. Keep natural and casual. Preserve texture in foliage and ground.

camera.pov_hint: tripod, eye level or slightly above
camera.framing_hint: clean centered framing, minimal negative space

imperfections.grain: very subtle grain (ISO 100-200), clean but not synthetic

recipes.scene_template: Clean studio portrait: neutral or gradient background, soft professional lighting (softbox/umbrella look). Subject well-lit with gentle shadows. Studio aesthetic but skin texture preserved.
recipes.negative_template: No heavy beauty retouching, no plastic skin. Keep natural skin texture visible. No harsh shadows or unflattering angles.
